Narrator: Izmants Ziedonis

"I am Latvian" is a story of Latvians, forced to leave the Motherland and to seek for a refuge in exile. The documentary tells about these people, who have put down the roots outside their country during a long time and being active and hardworking have managed to receive a good education, get a good job and become respected in the society even in exile, maintaining their national language and identity at the same time.

The documentary was shot between 1988 and 1990. At that time it was very courageous project - the Latvian National Awakening movement had just begun, but the film director Ansis Epners already traveled the world in order to make the Latvians in Latvia and Latvians in exile meet at least in a film and confirm: "I am Latvian!"
